features: EXPANDABLE & LARGE CAPACITY: This extra large travel backpack with expandable feature offers you more packing capacity. Unzipping to get 40L storage then can easily hold packing cubes, make-up bag, outfits, camera bag and gear, etc. It fits overhead and under seat while on state of standard carry on size, is ideal for men, women, weekend traveler, or occasional vacationer. This versatile luggage backpack also meets airline carry-on requirements, for airlines such as Easy Jet, Spirit, Jet Blue

CONVERTIBLE DESIGN: The carry on backpack is designed with hideaway padded shoulder straps which can be easily stored away in zippered back panel, transforming this vacation backpack from carry-on duffel to briefcase style and provide you a more flexible carrying experience. A luggage strap on the back is designed to fit on luggage/suitcase, for easier carry on international travel or cruise. A great gifts for people who travel

EASY TO CARRY: The luggage backpack is light to carry due to its adjustable shoulder straps, comfortable air-mesh ventilated back panel. 2 padded grab handles are set on the top and the side of the travel backpack, making it easily to take the bag from an overhead bin. The best gift choice for Thanksgiving Day, Christmas, New Year, Valentine's Day, also available as travelers gifts

BUILT FOR TRAVEL: Front compartment is for little gear such as phone, earphone. The large inside pocket has internal compression elastic straps. The padded straps include a sternum strap that can be adjusted upward or downward, set to go across your chest, relieving the weight from your shoulder. 4 external compression straps keep contents from sloshing around and can get an inch or 2 more of vertical space also reduced stress on the zippers.Best gift for dad

DURABLE and LIFETIME : This large travel backpack is made of water resistant lightweight polyester with lockable zipper heads. Could be survived in different temperatures. With sturdy zippers and decent stitching, this backpack won't show any defects when on the go, ensuring you an unforgettable weekend getaway. Does your partner like to travel? It's an ideal gifts for traveler. It's also a practical Christmas and New Years gift for your parents, traveler

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I don’t like backpacks as a rule…
reviews.reviewText: I bought this out of frustration as a “quick fix” because the wheeled carry on I wanted was unavailable, and so many of the wheeled cases seem to have problems with the handle getting stuck in the open position or wheels being damaged. Others just weigh too much. I figured this would be a temporary stand-in until I got the one I wanted. But, it turns out that I love this backpack. At 27L, I think it is their smallest, yet it holds more than I need, and it’s expandable. I love that it opens like a suitcase, instead of having to load it from the top like most backpacks. It also has an outside pocket for my iPad and travel documents. Straps are very comfortable, but can also be conveniently tucked away. Finally, the pack also looks good and the material seems tough and durable. I have a feeling I may just stick with this and never buy that rolling carry-on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars AMAZING bag and price!!
reviews.reviewText: This travel bag is AMAZING!! It looks just like one of the expensive Cotopaxi travel bags for 1/10 the price!! I bought one for my daughter who is traveling to Spain soon and she said her friend has a similar bag she bought for $250.It is definitely a durable bag. Expandable side zippers, nice compartments, hidden backpack straps if you choose to not use - you just zip them up inside a hidden compartment - that's one of my favorite features actually as I hate those hanging out if I want to check my bag!So we loved it so much we have now purchased another one. The Navy/Black combo is really nice and will stand out from all the basic back bags.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So much space and a great value!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this backpack for travel as my personal item/carry on. I overpacked for a 3 night trip and yes, the bag was stuffed but it still remained comfortable to carry on my back. I appreciate the little zippers and pockets and as I said, all the space it provides. It fit a ton! Highly recommend, especially for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect travel bag for quick trips
reviews.reviewText: Used this bag as a carry on personal item to avoid check-in on our flights. It holds alot and the material quality and overall craftmanship is amazing. Zippers are fantastic. The bag is comfortable to wear too. I love that the backpack straps can be stowed away if you choose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Overall Great Value
reviews.reviewText: Was looking for a bag I can use for 1-2 day trips to reduce the number of bags. Typically I used a rolling bag and a backpack.Looking at options out there I choose this one as a less expensive option. Was able to fit in three days of clothes pretty comfortably using compression packing cubes. Was also able to carry my laptop (it doesn’t have a laptop compartment but I have a sleeve that I used for it.).Was comfortable on my back and had no problems carrying it on the flight.Only things I wish it had was a bit more spacious front pocket, a bottle holder in the outside, and a dedicated laptop space. But given the cost I’m not complaining.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent backpack when traveling by train
reviews.reviewText: I recently had to do some long distance traveling by train to visit family. The backpack I originally brought with me hurt my back so badly. I ordered this one, it came within a few hours, IN THE SAME DAY and it was great for the rest of my trips. I’ve taken it on a few of those long distance trips which require a lot of walking on my feet through the city and have been pleasantly surprised each time with how comfortable this backpack was. It holds a lot of things, has a few extra compartments and you can even unzip it to extend it a little further to fit more in it if needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This bag holds SO MUCH STUFF and is SO EASY TO CARRY!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this bag quickly before a part-work trip because my old reliable laptop bag finally gave out. This had a good price for Prime Day and looked big enough to haul my 17inch laptop and other computer must-haves as a carry-on. I figured I would have a little room left to pack a light jacket and my purse stuff... THIS THING IS ENORMOUS! First off, the laptop section is roomy enough for the main machine PLUS all the accessories, leaving the entire main section of the backpack usable for literally everything else! I packed a raincoat, a jacket, 2 pairs of shoes, all my purse necessities, a book, a neck pillow, and 2 bags of snacks with room to spare - and that's not even mentioning the EXPANDABLE panels! The backpack straps are wide and padded and made hiking through my destination city a breeze. The grab handles on the top and side were handy when I was getting thru transportation hubs. The exterior material is sturdy and waterproof, proven as I trudged through a driving rainstorm on the trip. Importantly, I did not feel like I was carrying around a backpack - it has clean lines and no weird misplaced pockets or garish hardware colors. It's minor, but I care out these little aesthetic points! The only down side is just how huge it is - it is tooo easy to overfill this bag and get it unwieldy. I crammed souvenirs and extras into it for my trip home, and it was almost too heavy - but still without needing to expand the side panels! I would buy this bag again and again, and if you are a traveler who needs to carry a large laptop, this bag is for you, too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect size for traveling
reviews.reviewText: I had ordered the L and the XL to compare and we will be needing to pack for the weekend and the XL seems perfect size, with many pockets and lightweight, Highly recommend for weekend trips.
Muy práctica y excelente opción para llevar de viaje, está espaciosa, resistente y por el precio vale mucho la pena.

I searched and bought so many bags for my upcoming trip but none ever fit everything I needed to take.I have FINALLY found the perfect bag for me. I love how it can convert to a backpack. The material is really good quality. It has a lot of usable space. It is a rectangle so no wasted space. It has 2 big zipper outside pockets. The largest easily fits my 15.6 laptop. It also has 2 straps on each side of the bag so you can compress the contents. Bonus that it has a luggage strap on back so you can put over luggage handle.

Compré la mochila para usarla en el avión por tener forma de apertura como una maleta y aprovechar mejor el espacio, tiene expansible por lo que puedes meter más cosas. Adquirí el tamaño grande y no tuve problemas en el avión y si cabía debajo del asiento. Tiene muchos compartimientos. Lo que pudiera mejorar con respecto a otros es un compartimiento dedicado para laptop ( pero si no viajas con ella no importa ) y uno externo para meter botella de agua … en gral contenta con el producto
Buena calidad en costuras y cierres, y con muy buen espacio

I can now confidently write a review of this bag after using it for three European trips since May 2022. It is absolutely fabulous! My first use was a week trip and the second and third trips were for two weeks. It is a clamshell design and if you pack efficiently (I rolled most of my clothing) it fits everything you need. During the past two and a half week trip, I bought a few extra gifts and some clothing and it was quite full. I used the expanding zipper for the first time. I had looked at $200 bags when I was hunting for a clamshell backpack, but went for this one because of some of the more helpful reviews. I was nervous because of the cheaper price and some of the negative reviews. I am so glad I did. It is solid. No sign of tearing or stress in the straps or zippers. I have walked through big airports with this on my back and it is perfect. I admit it is a bit heavy when standing with it in your back for long periods of time so take it off until you need to walk with it. The bag is so well made, very sturdy fabric, very sturdy straps and very good zippers. Very very happy with this purchase. And even with the expanding zipper open, this bag will easily fit the suitcase regulations of all airlines. So much better than a pull carry-on with wheels which don’t always fit the airline’s bag stipulations because of the wheels or rigid handles. And so much easier to walk with it on your back through cobblestones streets. In fact, I walked the 25 minutes to our hotel from the train station on our recent trip with it on my back while my husband had to frequently pick his case up because the wheels wouldn’t go over the cobblestones streets. Yup, it was hot (35 degree weather) and I was glad to remove it but was more than happy not to have to carry it. Such a great bag!!!!!
